libros.tagline: For more than two decades legendary trainer Tim Grover has taken the greats‚ÄîMichael Jordan; Kobe Bryant; Dwyane Wade and hundreds of relentless competitors in sports business and every walk of life‚Äîand made them greater. Relentless shows you how even the best get better and how you can too.
